languages.text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//
languages.original_text:
Дружеские атаки не могут попасть в союзников. Проверки навыков против негативных эффектов способностей союзников всегда успешны.{br}
<align="center"> ///Благодеяние — Радикал -//

traits.locale_text:
Any "friendly fire" attacks from allies that can be dodged will be dodged by allies. Any "friendly fire" ability from allies that has a resistance test will be resisted by allies. {br}
<align="center"> ///Benevolentia — Zealot -//

Any attacks from allies that may hit other allies will be dodged if possible. Any allied ability that may target an ally and has a resistance test will be resisted by allies. {br}
<align="center"> ///Benevolentia — Zealot -//

Any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

languages.text:
Существа {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняются{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}атак{/g} союзников, которые могут в них попасть, если это возможно, и успешно проходят {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}проверки на сопротивление{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностям{/g} союзников, которые могут их затронуть и предполагают выполнение проверки. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g} — апологет -//

Allen {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Angriffen{/g} von Verbündeten, die andere Verbündete {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} könnten, wird bei Möglichkeit {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausgewichen{/g}. Allen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} Verbündeter, die auch auf Verbündete abzielen können und mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} verbunden sind, widerstehen Verbündete. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g} – Eiferer -//
languages.original_text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

traits.locale_text:
Allen {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Angriffen{/g} von Verbündeten, die andere Verbündete treffen könnten, wird bei Möglichkeit ausgewichen. Allen Fähigkeiten Verbündeter, die auch auf Verbündete abzielen können und mit einer Widerstandsprobe verbunden sind, widerstehen Verbündete. {br}
///Benevolentia — Eiferer -//

languages.text:
Dans la mesure du possible, les {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attaques{/g} des alliés susceptibles de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} d'autres alliés sont {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivées{/g}. Toute {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} alliée susceptible de cibler un allié et qui s'accompagne d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} peut faire l'objet de résistance de la part des alliés. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} — Zélote -//
languages.original_text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

traits.locale_text:
Dans la mesure du possible, les {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attaques{/g} des alliés susceptibles de toucher d'autres alliés sont esquivées. Toute capacité alliée susceptible de cibler un allié et qui s'accompagne d'un test de résistance peut faire l'objet de résistance de la part des alliés. {br}
///Benevolentia — Zélote -//

languages.text:
当盟友发动{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}，可能会{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}其他盟友时，只要这些攻击可以{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，就一定会被其他盟友闪避。当某个盟友施展的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}可以以盟友为目标，而且需要通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，所有受影响的盟友会自动抵抗此能力。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}自由主义{/g}——狂热者 -//
languages.original_text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

traits.locale_text:
当盟友发动{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}，可能会击中其他盟友时，只要这些攻击可以闪避，就一定会被其他盟友闪避。当某个盟友施展的能力可以以盟友为目标，而且需要通过抗性检定时，所有受影响的盟友会自动抵抗此能力。{br}
///人道主义——狂热者 -//

languages.text:
Todos los {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}ataques{/g} de aliados que puedan {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} en otros aliados serán {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivados{/g} si es posible esquivarlos. Cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de aliados que pueda afectar a un aliado y tenga una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} será resistida por los aliados.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}: Fanático -//
languages.original_text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

traits.locale_text:
Todos los {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}ataques{/g} de aliados que puedan impactar en otros aliados serán esquivados si es posible esquivarlos. Cualquier capacidad de aliados que pueda afectar a un aliado y tenga una prueba de fortaleza será resistida por los aliados.{br}
///Benevolentia: Fanático//

languages.text:
他の味方に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する可能性のある味方からの{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻撃{/g}は、可能なら{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}される。味方をターゲットする可能性があり、{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行う味方{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}に対して、味方は抵抗するようになる。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g} ― 狂信者-//
languages.original_text:
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} from allies that may {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} other allies will be {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodged{/g} if possible. Any allied {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} that may target an ally and has a {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} will be resisted by allies. {br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g} — Zealot -//

traits.locale_text:
他の味方に命中する可能性のある味方からの{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻撃{/g}は、可能なら回避される。味方をターゲットする可能性があり、抵抗判定を行う味方アビリティに対して、味方は抵抗するようになる。{br}
///ベネボレンティア ― 狂信者-//
